text: Nichika, did you go to the convenience store?

Yes,
they had a special promotion going on.

Yes! They had increased portions for things
like bento, snacks... even hot snacks were included!

Alright, let's go all out today!
I'm going to buy some too.

I should stock up on stuff during these kinds of
opportunities! It's nice to have something to munch on.

I always end up wanting
to buy hot snacks.

Those are the things
that make you gain the most weight, though...
